mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT content FROM map_content WHERE map_no = a.map_no) AS content FROM map as a WHERE user_no = #{user_no}
SELECT *, (SELECT content FROM map_content WHERE map_no = a.map_no) AS content FROM map as a ORDER BY creationtime DESC LIMIT ${startIdx},${pageRow};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM map_file WHERE filename_real = #{filename_real} AND file_no = #{file_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE map_content SET content = #{content}, regdate = NOW() WHERE map_no = #{map_no}
UPDATE map_file SET filename_org = #{filename_org}, filename_real = #{filename_real} WHERE map_no = #{map_no}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM map WHERE px = #{px} AND py = #{py} OR name LIKE '%${name}%'
